title: Graphcrypto
author: Graphcrypto
content: New Giveaway: Viking Poker ($KING)The rewards: 20000 ( 40000 $KING Tokens ) Gem Chest For completing all tasks: 2 Gem Chest Referral: No Rate: 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩Focus: The first 10000 participants (who complete all tasks without exception) will receive 2 Gem Chest eachGiveaway Link: Giveaway Bot▫️Join our telegram chat and write a positive message or ask a question about the project▫️Join advertising channel▫️Follow us on Twitter and Retweet This Tweet▫️Follow Ad page and Retweet This Tweet and @Tag 3 Friends and HashTag #LegitCommunity #Viking_Poker #NFT #Giveaway ▫️Follow us on Discord▫️Submit your BinanceSmartChain (BEP20) wallet address in the Giveaway bot  ⚠️The list of winners will be tweeted with the hashtag #LegitCommunityWinners⚠️Note: Giveaway ends 31 May . Distribution of the reward 1 JuneAdditional Information: Viking.poker will gather various types of poker games and competition gameplay. Each type of games will provide players with unique gaming experience and battle for glory under the premise of global compliance. In different gameplay and matches, players can use abilities and talent in the game or ingenious strategies to compete and achieve high rankings, in order to earn generic metaverse token. As the gameplay expands, there will be a steady stream of cash flowing into the game.Website | Whitepaper | Telegram | Twitter | DiscordDisclaimer: Please do your own research before joining to any giveaways project, also giveaway  is 100% free. Don't send any fee or penny for receiving giveaways tokens. Just join giveaways for free.
